# AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection

**Structure**

A collection of animations an entity can play.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AnimationCollection
```

## Overview

You use `AnimationCollection` to access animations in an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationLibraryComponent].

The initializers for [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationLibraryComponent] create an `AnimationCollection`, so you don’t need to create one directly. You can access the collection with the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationLibraryComponent/animations] property.

## Creating an animation collection

- **init(dictionaryLiteral:)**: Creates an animation collection from a dictionary literal.

## Inspecting an animation collection

- **count**: The number of animations in the collection.
- **isEmpty**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the collection is empty.

## Accessing animations

- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses a single animation in the collection with a key.
- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses animations in the collection within an index range.
- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses a single animation in the collection at an index.
- **AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection.SubSequence**: A sequence that represents a contiguous subrange of animations in the collection.
- **AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection.Element**: A key-value pair from the collection consisting of the name of an animation and the animation itself.

## Manipulating indices

- **startIndex**: An index to the first animation in the collection.
- **endIndex**: An index to the last animation in the collection.
- **index(after:)**: Returns the position in the collection that follows an index.
- **formIndex(after:)**: Replaces the index with its successor.
- **AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection.Index**: An object that represents a position in the collection.

## Iterating over animations

- **makeIterator()**: Returns an iterator over the animations in the collection.
- **AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection.Iterator**: An object to iterate over all animations in the collection.

## Subscripts

- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses animations in the collection within an index range.

## Animation playback

- **AnimationResource**: An animation for the properties of scenes or entities.
- **AnimationLibraryComponent**: A component that represents a collection of animations that an entity can play.
- **AnimationEvents**: Notable milestones that the framework signals during animation playback.
- **AnimationPlaybackController**: A controller that manages animation playback.
- **AnimationRepeatMode**: Options that determine whether an animation replays after completion.

## Conforms To

- Collection
- Sequence
